Name: Infernum
About the game: Infernum is an isometric ARPG featuring enemy mobs and PVP action. Up to 12-players fight each other with different weapons and magical spells. There are four different skills; Health, Strength, Stamina and Magicka all of whom affect gameplay in their own way. Features * PVP action * Various skills * Enemy mobs * Leveling system
Meta Title: Infernum: Nov 15, 2019, Altope Interactive and Full Overview
